name: A La Mode Pie Express
address: 1689 Johnston St, Vancouver, BC V6H 3S2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Clam Chowder Puff Pot Pie with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: One of our most popular items, our New England-style clam chowder pot pie features sweet and salty manilla clams in a creamy house-made broth. Russet potatoes and smoky bacon round out this crowd favorite.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Pot Pie with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Our rich and hearty chicken broth is made in-house with sautéed mushrooms, green peppers and a generous helping of herb roasted chicken.

hasMenuItem.name: Banana Cream Sliced Pie (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: This local favourite features a homemade banana pudding made with sliced bananas and creamy custard. Baked in shortbread pastry and topped with billows of mile-high meringue, this pie sure is as tasty as it is fun to eat.

hasMenuItem.name: Lemon Meringue Sliced Pie (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: Our famous lemon meringue pie features a tart homemade lemon pudding topped with billows of mile-high meringue. The combination of an explosive lemon flavour and sweet meringue give this pie a tantalizingly delicious taste!

hasMenuItem.name: Raspberry Rhubarb Sliced Pie (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: A pie ideally suited for the true pie connoisseur! Features a tart combination of juicy raspberries and rhubarb layered between flaky pie pastry.

hasMenuItem.name: Key Lime Sliced Pie (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: Meticulously crafted from an authentic Florida recipe, this key lime pie will surely thrill those looking for a citrus adventure. Made with fresh lime juice, condensed milk, eggs, and garnished with a slice of lime and a dollop of fresh whipped cream – a perfect treat for a garden party.

hasMenuItem.name: Apple Sliced Pie (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: One of our most popular items, this classic pie features fresh Golden Delicious Apples coated in butter and cinnamon before they're baked to perfection.

hasMenuItem.name: Coconut Cream Sliced Pie (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: A delightfully smooth marriage of meringue and coconut cream. This pie features a luscious homemade coconut filling layered on top of shortbread pastry and topped with fluffy mile-high meringue.

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Stew Puff Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: This classic pot pie features tender AAA Canadian Beef slowly cooked with a medley of fresh root vegetables in a rich beef broth. We keep our pot cooking to give our stew its signature rich flavour.

hasMenuItem.name: Pink Lemonade
hasMenuItem.description: Popular item.

hasMenuItem.name: Pecan Sliced Pie (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: If you're looking to satisfy your sweet tooth, our Southern Style Pecan Pie is made to satisfy! This sugar pie is loaded with pecans and baked to perfection in our ovens.

hasMenuItem.name: Pumpkin Sliced Pie (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, creamy pumpkin pie spiced with freshly grated ginger, cloves, cinnamon, and a dash of nutmeg. A fall favourite, but who says you can't enjoy fresh pumpkin pie year-round?

hasMenuItem.name: Mac & Cheese Shepherd's Pie 6"
hasMenuItem.description: Requires 2 hours of prep time. Grated cheddar, mozzarella, parmesan and gruyere are loaded into our signature pie crust and topped with mashed potatoes and a final layer of cheddar cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Butter Tart 9 Pack Box (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: Our famous Butter Tarts are homemade using a special filling of raisins, ground walnuts, and a sweet, buttery caramel sauce. The whole filling is added to golden-brown tart shells and baked to perfection in our oven.

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Stew Puff Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: This classic pot pie features tender AAA Canadian Beef slowly cooked with a medley of fresh root vegetables in a rich beef broth. We keep our pot cooking to give our stew its signature rich flavour.

hasMenuItem.name: Clam Chowder Puff Pot Pie with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: One of our most popular items, our New England-style clam chowder pot pie features sweet and salty manilla clams in a creamy house-made broth. Russet potatoes and smoky bacon round out this crowd favorite.

hasMenuItem.name: French Onion Puff Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Charred onions, fresh thyme, a touch of garlic, and a long cooking time give life to this rich soup. Finished with Mozzarella Cheese for that stretchy, gooey, goodness.

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Shepherds Pie with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Our gluten-free take on this classic features ground beef, sliced mushrooms, carrots, and onions topped with deliciously creamy mashed potatoes. Served with a side salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Pot Pie with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Our rich and hearty chicken broth is made in-house with sautéed mushrooms, green peppers and a generous helping of herb roasted chicken.

hasMenuItem.name: Quiche Lorraine 5" with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Our American-style quiche lorraine features a delicious blend of cheddar, scallions, and country-style ham.

hasMenuItem.name: Salmon Chowder Puff Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Smoked salmon in a creamy New England-style broth with hearty potatoes and herbs. Bacon free! A perfect substitute for our famous pacific clam chowder.

hasMenuItem.name: Tuna Croissant Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: An oven-toasted butter croissant filled with house-made tuna salad, lettuce, and tomatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Sliced Pie with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Includes whole eggs canadian bacon fresh tomatoes diced onions cheddar cheese and a flaky golden layer of pie pastry served warm with salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach Broccoli Quiche 5"  with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: This American style quiche features spinach, broccoli, and the perfect blend of cheddar and feta.

hasMenuItem.name: Mushroom Cream Puff Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Mushroom slices and stewed tomatoes in a creamy mushroom soup. Rosé style.

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey & Cheese Croissant Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: What's better than a turkey and cheese sandwich? A turkey and cheese croissandwich! This oven-toasted butter croissant filled with turkey, mozzarella, lettuce and tomatoes is a must try.

hasMenuItem.name: Ham & Cheese Croissant Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: An oven-toasted butter croissant filled with rosemary honey ham, mozzarella cheese, lettuce, and tomatoes. One of our most popular croissandwiches.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Cheese Croissant Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: An oven-toasted butter croissant filed with tomatoes, lettuce, and a generous helping of mozzarella cheese

hasMenuItem.name: Corn Chowder Puff Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet corn kernels are the star in this creamy chicken soup that's perfectly seasoned with a blend of herbs and spices. Each bowl is layered with a flaky layer of golden-brown puff pastry.

hasMenuItem.name: Pacific Salmon Pie with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Golden-brown pie filled with pacific salmon, accompanied by a fresh salad with mixed greens and sliced strawberries.

hasMenuItem.name: Broccoli Quiche 5" with Salad
hasMenuItem.description: An American-style quiche with sharp cheddar cheese and broccoli florets.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Chicken Pot Pie 9"
hasMenuItem.description: Our rich and hearty chicken broth is made in-house with sautéed mushrooms, green peppers and a generous helping of herb roasted Chicken.

hasMenuItem.name: Tourtière Pie (French Canadian Meat Pie)
hasMenuItem.description: Tourtière pie that has been a Quebec tradition for generations. Made with the AAA ground beef, the finest ground pork, and fresh seasoning, this pie will surely be a hit!

hasMenuItem.name: Gluten Free Chicken Pot Pie 9"
hasMenuItem.description: This gluten-free take on our signature pie features a rich and hearty chicken broth made in-house with sautéed mushrooms, green peppers and a generous helping of herb roasted Chicken. This pie is topped with our house-made gluten free pie pastry.

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Pie 9"
hasMenuItem.description: Start your day right with our delicious breakfast pie. Featuring whole eggs, Canadian bacon, cheddar cheese, fresh tomatoes and diced onions, this pie will have you starting your day off with a smile.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegan Savory Pie 9"
hasMenuItem.description: Featuring grilled tofu, sun-dried tomatoes, sauteed eggplant, peppers, zucchine and yam potato. Healthy AND tasty!

hasMenuItem.name: Apple Pie 9" (Veg)
hasMenuItem.description: A Pie-lovers staple, this apple pie is made from a traditional recipe that's bursting with flavour. We use fresh cut Golden Delicious and Granny Smith Apples coated in butter and cinnamon and baked to perfection in our ovens. For the full apple-pie experience, ask for it a la mode to receive a large scoop of vanilla ice cream.

hasMenuItem.description: Requires 6 hours notice. A Pie-lovers staple, this apple pie is made from a traditional recipe that's bursting with flavour. We use fresh cut Golden Delicious and Granny Smith Apples coated in butter and cinnamon and baked to perfection in our ovens. With an elegant lattice pattern on top, this pie looks as great as it tastes. Ask for it a la mode to receive a large scoop of vanilla ice cream.

review.reviewBody: Food is delicious .  Last order was incorrect and navigating DoorDash app was challenging.  Best butter tart I've ever had and roasted meringue on the coconut cream pie was divine
the apple  pie is so thick and sweet..omg..and the beef pie is a bit small but the flavor makes up for it
Got this pie as a last minute (sameday)  birthday celebration. It arrived within the hour and it was exactly what I wanted. Big fluffy clouds of meringue and banana flavoured custard.

Always the best coconut cream pie in Vancouver.

Phil

The Beef Stew Puff Pot Pie is not a pie, it's a cup of mediocre beef stew (with mushrooms, which was not listed in the description) and a puff pastry laid on top in lieu of a cup lid.  I ended up throwing most of it away.  I can't review the Key Lime Sliced Pie (Veg) because they gave me lemon meringue instead, which I don't like so it's also going in the bin.  The Lemon Curd Individual Tart is good, but not $30+ good.  Won't be returning, this was a complete waste of money.
